item.title: Upbit Goes on Coin Listing Spree as Bithumb Claws Back Market Share
item.description:
The crypto exchange Upbit has launched a coin listing spree as a response to its South Korean rival Bithumb’s trading volume growth.

item.title: Next 100x Cryptos to Buy Today – 11 September
item.description:
The crypto market cap has returned above $4T. Reporting has examined three sub-$1 meme tokens: Maxi Doge ($MAXI) with a presale at $0.0002565 and staking up to 157% APY; PEPENODE ($PEPENODE) with mine-to-earn and near $1M raised; Wall Street Pepe ($WEPE) planning a Solana rollout with a 1:1 ETH burn.

The post Next 100x Cryptos to Buy Today – 11 September  appeared first on Cryptonews.

item.title: Crypto Price Prediction Today 11 September – XRP, Solana, Avalanche
item.description:
Crypto price prediction today has reviewed XRP, Solana and Avalanche as markets have firmed ahead of US inflation data and possible FOMC rate cuts. Market cap has risen 1.7%. XRP has gained after a BBVA partnership; SOL has seen high ETF odds; AVAX has rallied on treasury and ETF developments.

The post Crypto Price Prediction Today 11 September – XRP, Solana, Avalanche appeared first on Cryptonews.

item.title: Google’s Gemini AI Predicts the Price of XRP, Dogecoin and Cardano by the End of 2025
item.description:
Gemini predicts outcomes for XRP, Dogecoin and Cardano as crypto has rebounded. It has projected XRP near $9 by 2025, DOGE toward $0.40 this year, and ADA up to $10 by 2026, with U.S. policy moves and Bitcoin’s record high having set the backdrop into the holiday season.

The post Google’s Gemini AI Predicts the Price of XRP, Dogecoin and Cardano by the End of 2025 appeared first on Cryptonews.

item.title: Trump CFTC Pick Brian Quintenz Shares Key Messages With Tyler Winklevoss As Confirmation Stalls
item.description:
Brian Quintenz has posted on X that messages with Tyler Winklevoss show a push to pause his CFTC nomination amid a stalled confirmation. Context includes Gemini’s $5M CFTC penalty and its 2025 complaint alleging investigative misconduct; his confirmation status is unresolved.

The post Trump CFTC Pick Brian Quintenz Shares Key Messages With Tyler Winklevoss As Confirmation Stalls appeared first on Cryptonews.

item.title: BlackRock Plans $2T Real-World Asset Boom with the Tokenization of ETFs
item.description:
BlackRock has explored Tokenization for ETFs linked to stocks as RWA activity has expanded. BUIDL has exceeded $2B, IBIT has added 2025 inflows, and digital AUM has reached $79.6B, while Ondo Finance and Nasdaq have reported tokenized market initiatives.

The post BlackRock Plans $2T Real-World Asset Boom with the Tokenization of ETFs appeared first on Cryptonews.

item.title: Bitcoin Hyper Raises $200K in 24 Hours to Smash $15M in Presale – Can It Repeat Bitcoin’s 227,000,000% Run?
item.description:
Bitcoin Hyper has passed $15M in presale, including $200K in 24 hours. The SVM-based Layer-2 anchors state to Bitcoin while targeting Solana-level throughput and offers a canonical bridge for wrapped BTC. It has announced SPL compatibility to port Solana dApps. Backers have compared it to BTC.

The post Bitcoin Hyper Raises $200K in 24 Hours to Smash $15M in Presale – Can It Repeat Bitcoin’s 227,000,000% Run? appeared first on Cryptonews.

item.title: Bitcoin Price Prediction: BTC Near $114K as Protests, ETH Demand Lift Crypto
item.description:
Bitcoin holds near $114K as protests fuel crypto demand, ETH treasuries surge, and Russia weighs a state-backed crypto bank. Could BTC rally to $130K?

The post Bitcoin Price Prediction: BTC Near $114K as Protests, ETH Demand Lift Crypto appeared first on Cryptonews.

item.title: Solana Treasury Firms Boost Holdings to 6.5M SOL as Upexi Posts 126% Surge
item.description:
Solana treasury activity has broadened as Upexi has disclosed 2.02M SOL with ~8% staking yield and BIT Mining has lifted holdings past 44K SOL. Institutions have pursued new vehicles, SOL has neared 2021 highs, and DeFi TVL has reached $12.2B amid steady accumulation.

The post Solana Treasury Firms Boost Holdings to 6.5M SOL as Upexi Posts 126% Surge appeared first on Cryptonews.

item.title: Bcachefs Outlines Plans For Shipping As A DKMS Out-Of-Tree Kernel Module
item.description: With Linus Torvalds having recently marked Bcachefs as being "externally maintained" following ongoing disagreement over the generally accepted Linux kernel development practices, the plans were laid out today for shipping Bcachefs as an out-of-tree DKMS module...
